item.title: Caitlin add a quote by Lauren Oliver
item.description: "Both of us will die today, gunned down or smashed up or exploded in some terrible moment of fire and twisted metal, and when they go to bury us we'll be so melted together and entwined they won't be able to separate the bodies; pieces of him will go with me, and pieces of me will go with him." -- Lauren Oliver

item.title: Caitlin add a quote by Gillian Flynn
item.description: "I was not a lovable child, and I'd grown into a deeply unlovable adult. Draw a picture of my soul, and it'd be a scribble with fangs." -- Gillian Flynn

item.title: Caitlin add a quote by Joshua Ferris
item.description: "almost nothing was more annoying than having our wasted time wasted on something not worth wasting it on" -- Joshua Ferris
